DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Top 10 (log)
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select top 10 u.[Name] as userName, count(u.[Name]) as count, u.[Oid] as userId
from [User] u, [UserLogon] ul
where ul.[User] = u.[Oid] and Year(ul.[Day]) = @year and (u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
                                                                and (u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
                                                                and (u.[Company] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by u.[Name], u.[Oid]
order by count(u.[Name]) desc"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["year","Department","Division","Company"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Filters
Activity over the Year
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetHeight":0,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with logins as 
(
	select	Convert(Date, ul.Day) as date,
			count(1) as countLog
	from	UserLogon ul
	inner join [User] u
	on ul.[User] = u.[Oid]
	where Year(day) = @year and (u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
								and (u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
								and (u.[Company] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by Convert(Date, ul.[Day])
),
blocks as
(
	select	Convert(Date, al.UtcLogTime) as date,
			count(1) as countBlocked
	from	AssistantLog al
	inner join [User] u
	on al.[User] = u.[Oid]
	where Year(al.UtcLogTime) = @year and (u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
								and (u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
								and (u.[Company] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by Convert(Date, al.[UtcLogTime])
),
getDat as 
(
	select l.date
	from logins l
	union
	select b.date
	from blocks b
),
maintable as
(
	select gd.[date] as date,
		IsNull(l.countLog, 0) as countLog,
		IsNull(b.countBlocked, 0) as countBlock
	from [getDat] gd
	full join logins l
	on l.date = gd.[date]
	full join blocks b
	on b.date = gd.[date]
),
total as
(
	select sum(m.[countLog]) as totalLog,
			sum(m.[countBlock]) as totalBlock,
			Month(m.[date]) as month
	from [maintable] m
	group by Month(m.[date])
),
averages as
(
	select (t.[totalLog]/22) as averageLog,
			(t.[totalBlock]/22) as averageBlock,
			t.[month] as month
	from [total] t
	group by t.[month], (t.[totalLog]/22), (t.[totalBlock]/22)
)
select m.[date] as date, m.[countLog] as countLog, m.[countBlock] as countBlock,
		a.[averageLog] as averageLog, a.[averageBlock] as averageBlock,
		t.[totalLog] as totalLog, t.[totalBlock] as totalBlock
from [maintable] m
full join [averages] a
on Month(m.[date]) = a.[month]
full join [total] t
on Month(m.[date]) = t.[month]
order by m.[date]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["year","Department","Company","Division"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Department stats
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":250,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with logins as 
(
	select	u.[Oid] as idU,
			count(1) as countLog
	from	UserLogon ul
	inner join [User] u
	on ul.[User] = u.[Oid]
	where Year(ul.[Day]) = @year
	group by u.[Oid], u.[Name]
),
blocks as
(
	select	u.[Oid] as idU,
			count(1) as countBlocked
	from	AssistantLog al
	inner join [User] u
	on al.[User] = u.[Oid]
	where al.OperationType = 'Block' and Year(al.[UtcLogTime]) = @year
	group by u.[Oid], u.[Name]
),
leaves as
(
	select u.[Oid] as idU,
		count(1) as countLeaves
	from [Analytics].[DatamartLeave] ad
	inner join [User] u
	on u.[Oid] = ad.[UserId]
	where Year(ad.[Date]) = @year
	group by u.[Oid], u.[Name]
),
timesheetAux as
(
	select u.[Oid] as idU,
		count(1) as countTimesheets
	from [Timesheet] t
	inner join [User] u
	on u.[Oid] = t.[CreatedBy]
	where Year(t.[CreatedOn]) = @year
	group by u.[Oid], u.[Name]
)
select c.[Name] as companyName, c.[Oid] as companyId, c.[HasImage] as cHasImage, di.[Name] as division, de.[Name] as department, u.[Name] as userName, u.[Oid] as userId, u.[HasImage] as uHasImage, t.[Name] as typology,
		IsNull(lo.countLog,0) as Logs, 
		IsNull(b.countBlocked,0) as Blocks, 
		IsNull(le.countLeaves,0) as Leaves,
		IsNull(ts.[countTimesheets], 0) as Timesheets
from [Company] c, [Division] di, [Department] de, [UserTypology] t, [User] u
full join logins lo 
on (lo.idU = u.[Oid])
full join blocks b
on (b.idU = u.[Oid])
full join leaves le
on (le.idU = u.[Oid])
full join timesheetAux ts
on (ts.idU = u.[Oid])
where u.[Company] = c.[Oid] and u.[Division] = di.[Oid] and u.[Department] = de.[Oid] and u.[Typology] = t.[Oid]
and (u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
and (u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
and (u.[Company] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["year","Department","Division","Company"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Absences booked per type
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetHeight":0,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select ad.[LeaveType], count(ad.[LeaveType]) as count
from  [User] u, [Analytics].[DatamartLeave] ad
where u.[Oid] = ad.[UserId] and Year(ad.[Date]) = @year 
                            and (u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
							and (u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
							and (u.[Company] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by ad.[LeaveType]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["year","Department","Division","Company"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Top 10 (leaves)
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select top 10 u.[Name] as userName, count(u.[Name]) as count, u.[Oid] as userId
from [User] u, [Analytics].[DatamartLeave] ad
where ad.[UserId] = u.[Oid] and Year(ad.[Date]) = @year and (u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
                                                                and (u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
                                                                and (u.[Company] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by u.[Name], u.[Oid]
order by count(u.[Name]) desc"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["year","Department","Division","Company"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Top 10 (block)
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"showSubTitle":false,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select top 10 u.[Name] as userName, count(u.[Name]) as count, u.[Oid] as userId
from [User] u, [AssistantLog] al
where al.[User] = u.[Oid] and Year(al.[UtcLogTime]) = @year and (u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
                                                                and (u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
                                                                and (u.[Company] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by u.[Name], u.[Oid]
order by count(u.[Name]) desc"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["year","Department","Division","Company"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetHeight":0,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with leaves as
(
	select convert(Date, ad.[Date]) as date, count(1) as countLeave
	from  [Analytics].[DatamartLeave] ad
	inner join [User] u
	on u.[Oid] = ad.[UserId]
	where Year(ad.[Date]) = @year and (u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
								and (u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
								and (u.[Company] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by convert(Date, ad.[Date])
),
timesheetAux as 
(
	select convert(Date, t.[CreatedOn]) as date, count(1) as countTimesheet
	from [Timesheet] t
	inner join [User] u
	on u.[Oid] = t.[CreatedBy]
	where Year(t.[CreatedOn]) = @year and (u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
								and (u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
								and (u.[Company] = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by convert(Date, t.[CreatedOn])
),
getDat as
(
	select l.date
	from leaves l
	union 
	select t.date
	from timesheetAux t
),
maintable as
(
	select gd.[date] as date,
		IsNull(l.countLeave, 0) as countLeave,
		IsNull(t.countTimesheet, 0) as countTimesheet
	from [getDat] gd
	full join leaves l
	on l.date = gd.date
	full join timesheetAux t
	on t.date = gd.date
),
total as
(
	select sum(m.[countLeave]) as totalLeave,
			sum(m.[countTimesheet]) as totalTimesheet,
			Month(m.[date]) as month
	from [maintable] m
	group by Month(m.[date])
),
averages as
(
	select (t.[totalLeave]/22) as averageLeave, 
			(t.[totalTimesheet]/22) as averageTimesheet,
			t.[month] as month
	from [total] t
	group by t.[month], (t.[totalLeave]/22), (t.[totalTimesheet]/22)
)
select m.[date] as date, m.[countLeave] as countLeave, m.[countTimesheet] as countTimesheet,
		a.[averageLeave] as averageLeave, a.[averageTimesheet] as averageTimesheet,
		t.[totalLeave] as totalLeave, t.[totalTimesheet] as totalTimesheet
from [maintable] m
full join [averages] a
on Month(m.[date]) = a.[month]
full join [total] t
on Month(m.[date]) = t.[month]
order by m.[date]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["year","Department","Company","Division"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: User profile
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"polarchart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":250,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":true,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	metricType, userId, sum([Count]) as count
from	(
select
	'Logins' as metricType,
	v.[userId] as userId,
	(v.total * 100) / v.maxTotal as [Count]
from (
	select 
		ul.[User] as userId,
		count(*) as total,
		Max(count(*)) over () as maxTotal 
	from [UserLogon] ul
	where Year(ul.[Day]) = @year
	group by ul.[User]
) v
where userId = @userId
union all
select
	'Blocks' as metricType,
	z.[userId] as userId,
	(z.total * 100) / z.maxTotal as [Count]
from(
	select 
		al.[User] as userId,
		count(*) as total,
		Max(count(*)) over () as maxTotal 
	from [AssistantLog] al
	where al.[OperationType] = 'Block' and Year(al.[UtcLogTime]) = @year
	group by al.[User]
) z
where userId = @userId
union all
select
	'Leaves' as metricType,
	x.[userId] as userId,
	(x.total * 100) / x.maxTotal as [Count]
from (
	select 
		ad.[UserId] as userId,
		count(*) as total,
		Max(count(*)) over () as maxTotal 
	from [Analytics].[DatamartLeave] ad
	where Year(ad.[Date]) = @year
	group by ad.[UserId]
	) x
where userId = @userId
union all
select
	'Timesheets' as metricType,
	c.[userId] as userId,
	(c.total * 100) / c.maxTotal as [Count]
from (
	select 
		t.[CreatedBy] as userId,
		count(*) as total,
		Max(count(*)) over () as maxTotal 
	from [Timesheet] t
	where Year(t.[CreatedOn]) = @year
	group by t.[CreatedBy]
	) c
where userId = @userId
union all
select	'Timesheets' as metricType, @userId as userId, 0 as count
union all
select 'Leaves' as metricType, @userId as userId, 0 as count
union all
select 'Blocks' as metricType, @userId as userId, 0 as count
union all
select 'Logins' as metricType, @userId as userId, 0 as count
)t
group by metricType, userId","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["userId","year"]}}]
